description.narrative: Republic of Moldova is a country of migrants. According to the International Organization of Migration estimates about one million Moldovans are working abroad. Migration has high social costs and presents considerable risks. The vulnerable group of people suffering from migration are children from social-vulnerable families. There is to be mentioned the increase in the number of children without one or both parents. In 2011 over 50% of the children from rural schools and small towns were in the situation w hen one or both parents work abroad.The central goal of the project is contribution to prevent of youth migration in Moldova within implementation of job courses and anti-migration educational program in the poorest region of Chisinau City, Ciocana. The ma in objectives of the projects are to launch anti-migration/anti-trafficking program for children (training and legal/ psychological counseling) for children as well as to provide vocational courses for children to give them opportunities on employment. In order to achieve some long-lasting results it is also important to organize training for teachers. Within the project implementation a Teachers? Guide will be published to provide teachers with educational methodology in order to continue anti-migration pr ogram for children during the project implementation. During the project CPC develops partnerships further among NGOs Lyceum M.Berezovschi and local authorities.
